1.speaker: POLAR BEAR
1.character: どうしたの？　パンダくん

3.speaker: PANDA
3.character: 実はさ…　常勤パンダさんが
3.definition: Well, you see, Mr. Full-time Panda is going back home to China for a little while so he can attend a relative's wedding.

4.speaker: PENGUIN
4.character: なんで　それで 元気ないの？
4.definition: Why would you be down because of that?

5.speaker: PANDA
5.definition: Well, you see... Since he's taking a full week off,

6.speaker: PANDA
6.character: 代わりにバイト　フルに 入ることになっちゃったんだよ
6.definition: I have to work full-time for him that week.

9.speaker: PENGUIN
9.character: でも　たった１週間でしょ？
9.definition: But it's only for a week, right?

11.speaker: PANDA
11.character: 早起きできるかな…　しかも毎日
11.definition: I wonder if I can get up early, not to mention everyday.

12.speaker: PANDA
12.definition: I have no faith that I can actually do it.

13.speaker: PENGUIN
13.character: 大変なのは早起きじゃなくて 満員電車じゃない？
13.definition: I think you have to worry more about the packed trains rather than having to wake up early.

15.speaker: PENGUIN
15.character: 朝　会社に行く人たちで電車がいっぱいになるのが
15.definition: Packed trains are when the trains become full with all the people heading to work.

16.speaker: PENGUIN
16.character: 僕ら　コウテイペンギンは 慣れてるからいいけど…
16.definition: Us emperor penguins are used to it.

17.speaker: PANDA
17.character: え？　ペンギンさんも電車　乗るの？
17.definition: What? You ride the trains, too, Mr. Penguin?

18.speaker: PENGUIN
18.definition: No. At the South Pole, all of us huddle together and take care of the kids.

19.speaker: PENGUIN
19.character: もう　満員電車並みの混雑だよ
19.definition: It's really tight, like a packed train.

20.speaker: PENGUIN
20.character: みんな おしくらまんじゅう状態だもんね
20.definition: It's like playing push and shove nonstop.

23.speaker: PANDA
23.character: なんだか　楽しみになってきたよ
23.definition: I'm actually starting to get really excited.

24.speaker: PANDA
24.character: 早く帰って　明日に備えなくちゃ
24.definition: I need to hurry home and get ready for tomorrow.

25.speaker: PANDA
25.character: じゃあ…　ごちそうさま
25.definition: Well then, thanks for the food!

28.speaker: PANDA
28.character: 急がないと 満員電車に乗れないよ
28.definition: If I don't hurry, I won't be able to ride the packed train!

29.speaker: RINRIN
29.character: おはよう　パンダくん

30.speaker: PANDA
30.definition: Good morning. Are you headed to work? Good luck!

34.speaker: GIRL
34.character: お花　選んでいただけますか？
34.definition: Could you pick out some flowers for me?

35.speaker: PANDA
35.character: おしくらまんじゅうだね～
35.definition: Wow, it really is like oshikura manju. The doors are closing. Please be careful. The doors are closing.

36.speaker: PANDA
36.character: すみません パンダ専用車両はどこですか？
36.definition: Excuse me, where's the panda-only car? I don't think there is one.

37.speaker: PANDA
37.character: ど…　どこか… 空いてるところは…

39.speaker: ANNOUNCE
39.character: この先　揺れますので ご注意ください
39.definition: There will be a little shaking ahead, so please be careful.

42.speaker: PANDA
42.definition: Could you just put it over there?

43.speaker: HANDA
43.character: 朝からバイトで大変なのは わかるけどさ
43.definition: I know it's tough to have to start work so early in the morning,

44.speaker: HANDA
44.character: もう少し　お客さんにサービスしてよ
44.definition: but could you try to give the customers a little more service?

45.speaker: PANDA
45.character: もう　満員電車やだ…
45.definition: I don't want to ride in packed trains anymore.

46.speaker: PANDA
46.character: 半田さん　朝代わってよ
46.definition: Could you work for me in the morning instead, Mr. Handa?

47.speaker: HANDA
47.character: やだって言ったって 仕方ないでしょう？

48.speaker: PANDA
48.character: 僕　もう少し遅く来るから 朝だけパンダ代わって
48.definition: I'm going to come in a little later, so could you be the panda in the morning?

49.speaker: HANDA
49.character: 代われって言われても　無理だし
49.definition: I don't think that's going to work...

50.speaker: PANDA
50.character: 大丈夫　体型似てるから
50.definition: You'll be fine, you're shaped fairly close to a panda.

52.speaker: HANDA
52.character: ありえないから 頑張ってよ　約束でしょ
52.definition: It's not happening! Try to work a little harder! You promised!

53.speaker: HANDA
53.character: ごはん　ここ置いとくからね
53.definition: I'm setting your lunch right here.

54.speaker: PANDA
54.definition: Man... I'm losing my appetite thinking about the packed trains.

56.speaker: RINRIN
56.character: パンダくんにお届け物です
56.definition: I have a delivery for you, Panda.

58.speaker: PANDA
58.character: いつも見てます お仕事頑張ってね
58.definition: "I'm always watching you. Please keep up your best at work.

59.speaker: PANDA
59.character: あなたのファンより　リンリン

62.speaker: PANDA
62.definition: I'm going to do my best! Mom, Mr. Panda stood up!

65.speaker: PANDA
65.character: もしかして　リンリンちゃん？

67.speaker: PANDA
67.character: リンリンちゃん　僕　頑張るからね！
67.definition: Rin Rin? I'll do my best, okay? Rin Rin will be watching me.

68.speaker: PANDA
68.character: きっと…　あのなかに リンリンちゃんが…
68.definition: Rin Rin must be somewhere in that crowd.

69.speaker: HANDA
69.character: ここんとこ 張り切ってるな　パンダくん

71.speaker: POLAR BEAR
71.definition: Thanks for all your good work.

72.speaker: PANDA
72.character: 今日　常勤パンダさん 戻って来たんでしょ？
72.definition: Mr. Full-time Panda came back today, right?

74.speaker: PENGUIN
74.character: パンダくん１日も 遅刻しなかったんだってね
74.definition: I heard you weren't late once this week, Panda.

76.speaker: PANDA
76.character: 大切な人が見ててくれるから
76.definition: Someone really dear to me has been watching me.

77.speaker: PENGUIN
77.character: それにしても なんかすごく疲れてない？
77.definition: But it looks like you're really tired.

78.speaker: PENGUIN
78.character: なんだか　あちこち ボロボロで汚れてるし
78.definition: You look really beat up and dirty in various places.

79.speaker: PENGUIN
79.character: 頑張りすぎなんじゃない
79.definition: You may actually be working too hard.

80.speaker: PENGUIN
80.character: ゆっくり 休んだほうがいいと思うよ
80.definition: I think you should take a break. I can't let her see me looking like this.

82.speaker: PANDA
82.definition: I'm gonna head home. Hey! You're forgetting your Sweet Roasted Chestnut chocolates.

83.speaker: PANDA
83.character: 昨日もステキ 今日も頑張ってね
83.definition: "You were great yesterday. Please do your best today, too!"

84.speaker: PANDA
84.character: リンリンちゃん　１週間　僕頑張ったよ
84.definition: I worked really hard this week, Rin Rin.

86.speaker: PANDA
86.character: リンリンちゃん　今日も　僕が 朝からいるって思ってないかな
86.definition: I wonder if Rin Rin thinks I'll be there early today, too.

87.speaker: PANDA
87.character: すれ違いになったら大変
87.definition: It'd be awful if we just missed each other.

88.speaker: RINRIN
88.character: おはよう　パンダくん

90.speaker: RINRIN
90.character: 今日から　通常勤務じゃないの？
90.definition: Aren't you going back to part-time today?

91.speaker: PANDA
91.character: えっ？　ああ…　うん…

92.speaker: RINRIN
92.character: だよね　ドキッとしちゃったよ
92.definition: That's what I thought. I got scared for a moment.

93.speaker: RINRIN
93.character: 僕が選んだ花　気に入ってくれた？
93.definition: Did you like the flowers I picked out for you?

94.speaker: PANDA
94.character: えっ？　ああ　リンリンちゃんのお花？ 大切にしてるよ
94.definition: Oh, the flowers Rin Rin got for me? I'm taking good care of them.

95.speaker: RINRIN
95.character: あっ　そうだ　ちょっと 見せたいものがあるんだ
95.definition: Oh, that's right! I have something I want to show you.

97.speaker: RINRIN
97.definition: Look. Rin Rin's not here today? Oh, I'm Rin Rin.

99.speaker: RINRIN
99.character: パンダ　大好きなんだ

100.speaker: RINRIN
100.character: あっ　パンダくんは その中でも別格だよ
100.definition: Oh, and you're one of the best, Panda!

101.speaker: RINRIN
101.character: リンリンズ　ベストショットは　これ
101.definition: Rin Rin's best photo is this.

102.speaker: RINRIN
102.character: お気に入りだから 大きくしてみたんだ
102.definition: It's my favorite, so I had it blown up.

103.speaker: RINRIN
103.character: パンダくんにもあげるね
103.definition: I'll give you a copy, too.

110.speaker: PANDA
110.character: どうしたの？　何か考え事？
110.definition: What's wrong? Is something on your mind?

113.speaker: POLAR BEAR
113.character: なんで　信号って 赤　青　黄色の３色なのか考えてた
113.definition: I was trying to figure out why traffic lights are these three colors.

115.speaker: SASAKO
115.character: 違うよ　パンダくん

116.speaker: SASAKO
116.character: シロクマさん　カフェのスペシャルメニューを 考えてるんだよ
116.definition: Mr. Polar Bear is trying to figure out a special menu for the café.

117.speaker: PANDA
117.definition: A special menu? I failed the skills test again. Skills test?

118.speaker: POLAR BEAR
118.character: ああ　自動車教習所ね

119.speaker: PENGUIN
119.character: 大体　あの教官 細かすぎなんだよ！
119.definition: That instructor is too picky, anyway!

121.speaker: PENGUIN
121.character: いやね　キョロキョロしないで まっすぐ前を見ろ！　とか
121.definition: Like he was telling me, "Stop looking all over the place and watch where you're going,"

122.character: 慌てすぎるな！　とか

123.speaker: PENGUIN
123.character: ハンドルを握るときには 手を　パタパタさせるな！　とか
123.definition: or "Stop flapping around so much when you're holding the wheel."

124.speaker: SASAKO
124.character: それは　ダメなんじゃないですか？
124.definition: I think he has a point.

125.speaker: PENGUIN
125.definition: At this rate, I'll never be able to

126.character: いつまでたってもペン子さんを　ドライブデートに誘えないよ
126.definition: ask Miss Penko out on a driving date, because of that instructor.

130.speaker: PANDA
130.definition: That would be an electric light {\i1}(dento){\i0}.

132.speaker: PENGUIN
132.definition: I said "date!" I wonder how I can make her mine?

134.speaker: PENGUIN
134.character: シロクマくんなら　どうする？
134.definition: What would you do, Polar Bear?

136.speaker: PENGUIN
136.definition: You'd wait? I would earnestly wait.

137.speaker: PENGUIN
137.character: へえ～っ　なんか大人だね
137.definition: Wow, you're such an adult. Yes, if you can't do that, you can't become an adult.

139.speaker: POLAR BEAR
139.character: ひたすら　待って　待って　待って
139.definition: Earnestly wait, and wait, and wait,

141.speaker: PENGUIN
141.character: 射止めてないよ！ それじゃ仕留めちゃうよ！
141.definition: That's not making them yours {\i1}(itomeru){\i0}! That's taking them down {\i1}(shitomeru){\i0}!

142.speaker: PENGUIN
142.character: シロクマくん　ちゃんと考えてよ！
142.definition: Would you think about this seriously, Polar Bear?!

143.speaker: POLAR BEAR
143.character: ペンギンさん見てて思ったんだけど…
143.definition: I just had an idea, looking at you, Mr. Penguin.

145.speaker: POLAR BEAR
145.character: 笹子さん　パフェフェアーは　どうかな？
145.definition: How about a parfait fair, Miss Sasako?

146.speaker: SASAKO
146.character: パフェですか　いいですね

147.speaker: PENGUIN
147.character: 何それ？　デートと全然関係ないよね
147.definition: What the heck? That has nothing to do with dates.

148.speaker: PENGUIN
148.character: どこをどうすれば　そうなるの？
148.definition: How in the world did you get to that subject?

149.speaker: SASAKO
149.character: さっきまでスペシャルメニューの話を してたんですけど
149.definition: We were just talking about making a special menu,

150.speaker: SASAKO
150.character: なかなか決まらなくて
150.definition: but we couldn't figure out what it should be.

151.speaker: PENGUIN
151.character: スペシャルメニューでパフェ？
151.definition: So your special menu is going to have parfaits?

153.speaker: SASAKO
153.character: パフェはいいですけど

154.speaker: SASAKO
154.character: パフェフェアーって なんか言いづらいですよね
154.definition: but isn't "parfait fair" a bit hard to say?

159.speaker: POLAR BEAR
159.character: イチゴパフェ　バナナパフェ　チョコパフェ
159.definition: Strawberry parfait, banana parfait, chocolate parfait.

160.speaker: POLAR BEAR
160.character: 間違いはないけど　フェアなのに 定番だけじゃつまらない
160.definition: These are definitely parfaits, but it'd be boring to have just the normal lineup for the fair. Hmm, special parfaits, huh?

163.speaker: POLAR BEAR
163.character: をするんですよね？ メニューは決まりましたか？

164.speaker: MANDRILL
164.character: をするんですよね？ メニューは決まりましたか？
164.definition: You're having one, right? Have you decided on the menu yet?

165.speaker: POLAR BEAR
165.definition: I'm trying to decide as we speak.

166.speaker: MANDRILL
166.character: だったらマンドリルパフェは　どうですか？
166.definition: Then how about a mandrill parfait?

168.speaker: MANDRILL
168.character: マンドリルなパフェです
168.definition: It is a parfait that is a mandrill.

169.speaker: MANDRILL
169.character: それはもう　すごい迫力なんです！

170.speaker: POLAR BEAR
170.character: パフェに迫力はいらないかな
170.definition: I don't think parfaits need intensity.

171.speaker: POLAR BEAR
171.character: う～ん　スペシャルなパフェね

172.speaker: LLAMA
172.character: シロクマさんじゃないですか
172.definition: Well, if it isn't Mr. Polar Bear.

177.speaker: LLAMA
177.character: パフェフェアーをやるんですよね？
177.definition: You're going to have a parfait fair, right?

178.speaker: LLAMA
178.character: ステキなパフェを思いついたんですよ
178.definition: I thought up a spectacular parfait.

179.speaker: LLAMA
179.character: パフェなのに　とってもヘルシーなんです
179.definition: It's a parfait, but it's very healthy.

182.speaker: LLAMA
182.character: 草　大盛りパフェです
182.definition: A parfait with a large serving of grass.

183.speaker: LLAMA
183.character: どんなパフェかというとですね
183.definition: To explain the parfait in further detail,

184.speaker: LLAMA
184.character: お皿の上に草がのっていてですね
184.definition: there's grass on top of the plate...

186.speaker: LLAMA
186.character: その上に水煮の草が のっていていてですね
186.definition: And on top of that, there'll be boiled grass...

187.speaker: LLAMA
187.character: 更に　その上に覆いかぶさるように 産地直送の草がのるんです
187.definition: and then freshly delivered grass from the fields... will hang over the dish.

188.speaker: POLAR BEAR
188.character: いや　それすでにパフェじゃないし どっちかっていうとサラダかな
188.definition: Well, that's definitely not a parfait. If you had to call it something, it'd probably be a salad.

189.speaker: POLAR BEAR
189.character: う～ん　スペシャルなパフェ…

190.speaker: TORTOISE
190.character: シロクマさ～ん　ここです！

191.speaker: TORTOISE
191.definition: Please wait... I have... something to tell you.

192.speaker: POLAR BEAR
192.character: どうしたの？　ゾウガメさん

197.speaker: POLAR BEAR
197.definition: That might be a little hard to eat.

198.speaker: POLAR BEAR
198.character: う～ん　スペシャルなパフェ…
198.definition: Hmm, special parfaits... I wonder what would be good.

200.speaker: POLAR BEAR
200.character: あっ！　コアリクイくん

201.speaker: ANTEATER
201.definition: I thought of... I thought of a great parfait!

202.speaker: POLAR BEAR
202.definition: What kind of parfait is it? The topping is absolutely amazing!

203.speaker: ANTEATER
203.character: ビジュアルは黒ゴマ的ですが…
203.definition: Visually, it looks like black sesame,

204.speaker: ANTEATER
204.character: すごく　うごめいている！

205.speaker: POLAR BEAR
205.character: いや　それは　いいかな

206.speaker: ANTEATER
206.character: だから　めちゃくちゃ　生き生きと うごめいている　黒ゴマ的トッピングの…
206.definition: But they're like lively black sesame that wriggle! Japanese style is good, too, but...

207.speaker: PENGUIN
207.character: どうしたの？　シロクマくん

208.speaker: POLAR BEAR
208.character: 早く　パフェフェアーのメニュー　考えないと みんなが暴走してるから
208.definition: I need to hurry up and decide on the menu for the parfait fair. Everyone's going crazy.

210.speaker: PENGUIN
210.character: スペシャルメニューだけに　みんな 結構　楽しみにしてるんだね
210.definition: Since it's the special menu, I'm guessing everyone is looking forward to it.

211.speaker: PANDA
211.character: はい　は～い！　僕に　いいアイディア
211.definition: Hey! I have a great idea!

213.speaker: PANDA
213.character: これ　これ！　竹パフェ
213.definition: This is it! The bamboo parfait!

214.speaker: SASAKO
214.character: パンダくんに聞いて　作ってみました
214.definition: I got Panda's advice and tried to make it.

216.speaker: PANDA
216.character: 竹ゼリーに笹クリームをのせて 新鮮な笹とタケノコをトッピングした上に
216.definition: You start with bamboo jello and bamboo grass whipped cream, then top it with fresh bamboo grass and bamboo shoots,

217.speaker: PANDA
217.character: 刻んだ竹が いっぱい　のっかってるの
217.definition: and finish it off with lots of bamboo shavings!

218.speaker: PENGUIN
218.character: すごく緑色なパフェだね(-_-;)

219.speaker: POLAR BEAR
219.character: パンダくん以外　食べないかも
219.definition: I don't think anyone would eat it other than you, Panda.

220.speaker: PANDA
220.character: そう？ こんなに　おいしそうなのに？
220.definition: Really? Even though it looks this delicious?

221.speaker: PENGUIN
221.character: 刻んだ竹が口に刺さりそうだよ
221.definition: The bamboo shavings look like they'll stab you in the mouth.

222.speaker: PENGUIN
222.character: パンダくん…　パフェって言えば なんでも　パフェだと思ってるでしょ
222.definition: You probably think that anything can be on a parfait, Panda.

223.speaker: PENGUIN
223.definition: We can't leave it up to you.

224.speaker: PENGUIN
224.character: よし　ここは　僕のアイディアを…
224.definition: Here, I'll throw in my idea, too.

226.speaker: PENGUIN
226.character: ＤＨＡたっぷり　頭もよくなる
226.definition: It's full of DHA and it'll make you smart.

228.speaker: PENGUIN
228.character: じゃあ　今からだと 旬なアジとかでも　いいと思うよ
228.definition: Well, horse mackerel are in season, too. Let's avoid fish altogether.

229.speaker: POLAR BEAR
229.character: なんていうか　それ パフェっていうより…
229.definition: I wouldn't call that a parfait...

231.speaker: SASAKO
231.character: あっ！ こういうのは　どうでしょうか？

233.speaker: SASAKO
233.character: パンダの頭は　バニラアイスで 耳や顔は　チョコレートです
233.definition: The panda's head is made with vanilla ice cream, and its face and ears are made with chocolate.

234.speaker: PANDA
234.character: わぁ～！　パフェになっても パンダって　やっぱり　かわいいね
234.definition: Wow, pandas are cute even as parfaits!

235.speaker: SASAKO
235.definition: Then there's the bear bear parfait.

236.speaker: SASAKO
236.character: バニラとコーヒーアイスで作ってみました
236.definition: I made it with vanilla and coffee ice cream.

238.speaker: SASAKO
238.character: かき氷で氷山をイメージしました
238.definition: I made a glacier with shaved ice.

239.speaker: GIRLS
239.character: すご～い！ かわいい！　新商品ですか？
239.definition: Wow! How cute! Are these new?

240.speaker: SASAKO
240.character: あ…　いえ　試作品です
240.definition: Oh no, they're test products. You're welcome to try them if you'd like.

241.speaker: GIRL
241.character: えっ！？　いいんですか？

242.speaker: GIRLs
242.character: では… いただきます！
242.definition: Well then, thanks for the food!

243.speaker: GIRL
243.character: まずは　パンダさんから！

244.speaker: GIRL
244.character: じゃあ　ペンギンさんも！

245.speaker: GIRL
245.character: じゃあ　シロクマさんも！
245.definition: And then the polar bear. I think I'll eat the nose, too.

246.speaker: GIRL
246.character: アハハハハ！　ひどい！！　私も　えい！
246.definition: Oh, how mean! I'll have some, too.

247.speaker: GIRL
247.character: これ　絶対 お店で出してくださいね
247.definition: Please put these on your menu! How wonderful! They're a hit.

248.speaker: THREE
248.definition: Y-Yeah, great... Hey, listen to this! I failed the test again!

249.speaker: PENGUIN
249.character: いつも以上に大繁盛じゃない どうしたの？
249.definition: This place is a lot busier than usual. What happened?

250.speaker: PANDA
250.character: 新メニューのフェアが大人気らしいよ
250.definition: Apparently the new menu items are a hit.

251.speaker: PENGUIN
251.character: あぁ　パフェフェアー？

252.speaker: PANDA
252.character: ワンプレートランチフェア

254.speaker: PANDA
254.character: ペンギンさん　ペンギンさん

255.speaker: PENGUIN
255.character: どうしたの　パンダ君

256.speaker: PANDA
256.character: 何も言わないで　預金通帳もらえるかな
256.definition: Without asking me the details, could I have your bank book?

257.speaker: PENGUIN
257.character: 嫌だってこといいかな

259.speaker: POLAR BEAR
259.character: 次回のしろくまカフェは

260.speaker: POLAR BEAR
260.character: ボルトがル語でお送りします
